affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 保护, 守卫, 看护

bilingual.source: She looked upwards to see the stars.
The balloon floated upwards into the sky.
He pointed upwards to indicate the direction.
The elevator moved upwards to the top floor.
The staircase in the old house spirals upwards.
bilingual.target: 老房子里的楼梯螺旋形向上延伸。

bilingual.source: The gardener carefully trained the bine to grow upwards.
bilingual.target: 园丁小心地引导攀缘茎向上生长。

bilingual.source: The apical dominance phenomenon helps the plant grow upwards.
bilingual.target: 顶端的优势现象有助于植物向上生长。

bilingual.source: The temperature is expected to rise upwards in the coming days.
bilingual.target: 预计未来几天气温将向上升高。

bilingual.source: They are also spending more time working with each other rather than reporting upwards.
bilingual.target: 他们也花更多的时间相互合作，而不是向上汇报。

bilingual.source: They will move slowly upwards right to the side of space, 30 km away from the Earth.
bilingual.target: 它们将缓慢地向上移动到太空的右侧，距离地球30公里。

yingyinNormal.en: There are over 7 million people here with 57,000 people per square kilometer in places. To house them all, the city has had to build upwards.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里有七百多万人，基本上每平方公里达五万七千人。为了安置所有人，城市必须向上建造。

yingyinNormal.en: Your profit on a mere $6,000 investment would be upwards of $60,000!
yingyinNormal.zh: 您只需投资6千块就可以收获6万。

yingyinNormal.en: We can't see it from here because skylight looks upwards instead of sideways.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们从这看不到，因为天窗只能朝上看，看不见四周。

yingyinNormal.en: But you can never be lost for long in Montmartre, as long as you head upwards you'll eventually come to her gleaming white crown, Sacre-Cour Basilica.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过，在蒙马特区可没办法迷路太久，因为只要抬头仰望，一定会看到圣心堂闪闪发亮的白色皇冠屋顶。

yingyinNormal.en: I've got these gorgeous sun-dried chillies, and in Sichuan they're called "Shan tian wah chaw", which means upward-facing, or heaven-facing chillies, because they grow upwards.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我手上拿的是晒干的辣椒，四川人称之为“朝天椒”，意为“朝上生长或朝天生长的辣椒”，因为它们保持直立生长。

yingyinNormal.en: Travelling the eight hundred mile trip from Shanghai to Beijing used to take fourteen hours, now you can get there in just over five hours at speeds upwards of 180 miles per hour.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从上海到北京有一千两百多公里。过去需要十四个小时，现在你只需要五个多小时就能抵达，时速已达到两百九十公里。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: NYU is consistently ranked one of the country's most expensive schools, with room and board costs totaling <highlight>upwards</highlight> of $64, 000 a year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: NYU一直是美国最贵的学校之一，每年的食宿费用总计在64，000美元以上。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 即将到来的；即将发生的
adv. 向上；在上面；向上地；上涨

word_family.mean: adv. 向上；向较高处；靠近；由弱到强；由低到高；由轻到响；进入预想运转状态；进入快乐状态；公开展示地；逆风地；逆水地；在场上击球

examination_example.sentence: The bike is not hanging on a branch (树枝) —it is fixed in the tree and the tree has continued growing <highlight>upwards</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自行车没有挂在树枝上——它是固定在树上的，并且这棵树一直在向上生长。

examination_example.sentence: They will move slowly <highlight>upwards</highlight> right to the side of space, 30 km away from the Earth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们将缓慢地向上移动到太空的右侧，距离地球30公里。

examination_example.sentence: When plants shoot on the earth, their stems grow away from the gravity, and so they always shoot <highlight>upwards</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当植物在地球上生长时，它们的茎会脱离重力而生长，所以它们总是向上生长。
